1371: Radulphus was born in Op 't Speuy in 1371.
1377: Lost mother at the age of 6.
Thomas took care of Radulphus since Radulphus was 7.
1380: Lost father at the age of 9.
Left Op 't Speuy.A.3 for lack of a breadwinner.
Went to live in the orphanage at age 10.
1383: Lost sibling Pauels in 1383 when Pauels was 11.
1388: Radulphus moved to Die Coninc straet.A.8 in 1388.
Left orphanage at the age of 18.
1389: Got married to Hodine at age 19 in 1389.
Had Hodine move in at Die Coninc straet.A.8 after marriage.
1391: Had a son with Hodine, Rembrecht, at age 20.
Lost sibling Hadewigis in 1391 when Hadewigis was 15.
1393: Had a son with Hodine, Godeuert, at age 22.
1396: Had a daughter with Hodine, Clara, at age 25.
1398: Had a daughter with Hodine, Tetta, at age 27.
1399: Had a son with Hodine, Splinter, at age 28.
